name: Vitatio 3 (itch)
description:
VITATIO 3 brings a new take on the precision game genre, traverse your physics based ship through the asteroid belt in this infinite running score based avoidance game, upgrade your ship, unlock new paint jobs and customize your cockpit

★ DIFFICULT GAMEPLAY!
There are 3 standard modes, easy, medium and hard plus an unlockable mode DAFT which is where end game players compete for bragging rights

★ TRAIN YOUR REFLEXES!
VITATIO 3 is a game that favours the strong minded, it will test your patience and every time you lose, you are becoming better!

★ THIS IS THE DEMO AND THE FULL GAME IS AVAILABLE ON STEAM ★

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1457920/VITATIO_3/
